name: Operation Blackbird
description:
You are one of several Elite Troopers dropped in the region of a Large drug Operation. Your mission is to locate and capture the Leader of a band of Rebel mercenaries hired by the Drug Lords. It is imperative you take him alive, as the information he can  provide will bring down the whole Operation.

Travel through 4 Levels of game play as you search for the Rebel Camp and your objective - the apprehension and extraction of their Leader.

Encounter Rebel patrols, capture and question Rebel soldiers, meet up with other Elite Troopers, gather information and fight or die as you make your way to your objective....

But watch you back, when you reach the Rebel Leader HQ , the real battle begins!
